review: It's nice when it is working! It is a great price!  I find it pretty difficult to figure out what is wrong with it when it goes out. The Amazon prime is awesome, I give that 5 stars! It was very easy to install, just plug it into your HDMI port and plug in the power source. The Pluto channel has great streaming video channels but they skip a lot during prime watching hours, other than that they will show really good. I also got the fire box and that works great no skipping or lags with that at all worth the price for the box? The game controller was not worth it to me at all , I think I will return that.
author: Real Thoughts
